channel.title: Comments on: Corona Geek On Air – Episode 11 – Zombie Marketing, iPad Mini, Windows 8, and Mobile App Analytics

item.title: By: dingo
item.dc:creator: dingo
item.description:
thanks for featuring Grooh in this episode, we just have seen that (one year too late :)).
we have written our own little 2.5d engine with corona, not using any 3rd party tool in this game except texture packer for doing the spritesheets.
item.content:encoded:
thanks for featuring Grooh in this episode, we just have seen that (one year too late :)).

we have written our own little 2.5d engine with corona, not using any 3rd party tool in this game except texture packer for doing the spritesheets.

item.title: By: Charles McKeever
item.dc:creator: Charles McKeever
item.description: Kick starter seems like an interesting way to market your apps. I'd like to get someone on the show who has used it before to promote their new ventures.
item.content:encoded: Kick starter seems like an interesting way to market your apps. I’d like to get someone on the show who has used it before to promote their new ventures.
